name: Station 404
description:
Station 404

is an action-adventure hand-painted platformer across a mysterious research centre located in outer space. Join the protagonist to solve the mystery of her brother's radio silence while escaping squishy monsters using laser bullets, double jumps, and dash.

This game is complete. The story is a submission to the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022 and was made in a week.

___

Basic Controls

W, A, S, D - Run

Space - Jump

Space*2 - Double Jump

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Dash

E - Interact

___

Credits

Sinitana (instrumental music) https://youtu.be/VZtN7SOEJAw

___

If you enjoy our game, give us a follow!
